text: storing uploaded photos and documents - filesystem vs database blob
Property management web site where users can upload photos and lease documents.
For every apartment unit, there might be 4 photos, so there won't be an overwhelming number of photo in the system.
For photos, there will be thumbnails of each.
For the end user, I want to load pages and show the image as fast as possible.
Should I store the images inside the database, or file system, or doesn't matter?
Do I need to be caching anything?
